titles.title: When I look into Your holiness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: When I look into Your holiness. newline When I gaze into Your loveliness. newline When all things that surround become shadows, newline In the light of You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When I've found the joy of reaching Your heart. newline When my will becomes inthroned in Your love. newline When all things that surround become shadows, newline In the light of You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I worship You. I worship You. newline The reason I live is to worship You. newline 2x
